page.description: Enables selecting a NULL value when the user navigates beyond the last item in a ViewBox using arrow keys.

discussion.p: If *[ui:Loop navigate]* is enabled and the ViewBox is configured to [Allow NULL selection], the *[ui:Loop navigate null selection]* property is shown. The *[ui:Loop navigate null selection]* lets you configure what happens when the user navigates beyond the last item in teh ViewBox. If checked, all items in the ViewBox are de-selected, i.e. no items are selected.
If disabled, the first item in the ViewBox is selected when the user navigates beyond the end of the list of items in the ViewBox using arrow keys.
This property is only shown when both [Loop navigate] and [Allow NULL selection] are enabled.
